module.name: Set CallerID
module.description: Adds the ability to change the CallerID within a call flow.
module.changelog: *13.0.6* FREEPBX-12690 Restore usage info *13.0.5.1* FREEPBX-13519 Set CallerID Module - Apply Changes red button doesnt appear *13.0.5* Update Language *13.0.4* Slideout rnav *13.0.3* FREEPBX-10317 Fix tooltips *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Updates for visuals in 13 *2.11.0.4* Update license file *2.11.0.3* #7211 *2.11.0.2* Cleanup dbug statements *2.11.0.1* Fixes #6740 *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.2* #5180 *2.9.0.1* #4606 *2.9.0.0* 2.9 version moved to repo
